head.citation-title: Novel quaternion polar complex exponential transform and its application in color image zero-watermarking
head.abstracts: © 2021 Elsevier Inc.The robust watermarking method embeds the information in the image to protect the copyright. The embedding process will destroy the original image and cannot be effectively applied to the images used in the medicine and military with high integrity demand. A robust zero-watermarking algorithm for lossless copyright protection of color images without changing the original image was proposed in this paper. A novel quaternion polar complex exponential transform (NoQPCET) was firstly constructed with effectively improved performance; then the NoQPCET and chaotic system based robust color image zero-watermarking algorithm was suggested for lossless copyright protection of color images. In the proposed algorithm, the robustness against geometric attacks was enhanced due to the excellent geometric invariance of NoQPCET, and the security was also improved because of the initial value sensitivity of the chaotic system. Experimental results showed that this algorithm had very strong robustness against both geometric attacks and common image processing attacks, and was superior to other algorithms.

organization.$: School of Information Science and Technology

author-keyword.$: Novel quaternion polar complex exponential transform

coredata.dc:description: The robust watermarking method embeds the information in the image to protect the copyright. The embedding process will destroy the original image and cannot be effectively applied to the images used in the medicine and military with high integrity demand. A robust zero-watermarking algorithm for lossless copyright protection of color images without changing the original image was proposed in this paper. A novel quaternion polar complex exponential transform (NoQPCET) was firstly constructed with effectively improved performance; then the NoQPCET and chaotic system based robust color image zero-watermarking algorithm was suggested for lossless copyright protection of color images. In the proposed algorithm, the robustness against geometric attacks was enhanced due to the excellent geometric invariance of NoQPCET, and the security was also improved because of the initial value sensitivity of the chaotic system. Experimental results showed that this algorithm had very strong robustness against both geometric attacks and common image processing attacks, and was superior to other algorithms.
coredata.prism:publicationName: Digital Signal Processing: A Review Journal
coredata.dc:title: Novel quaternion polar complex exponential transform and its application in color image zero-watermarking

author-keyword.$: Novel quaternion polar complex exponential transform
